1.3.1.name: wordpress/sugarcrm-plugin
1.3.1.description:
This plugin allows you to manage your SugarCRM from within your Wordpress admin area.

Note - If you are needing to easily insert lead capture type forms into your Wordpress and or if you want to manage leads using our lead router etc. then please visit our site http://sugar.crmformbuilder.com for more information about our other commercial products that work with this plugin.

Special Offer!

FREE 3-Day Trial of our commercial SugarCRM Form Builder

v1.3

Features

  • Manage your SugarCRM from within your Wordpress admin area.

Discussion forum http://sugar.crmformbuilder.com/support/forum/
